segments.text: How do you spend your day , Helen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , on weekdays I get up around ten . Then I read the paper for an hour and have lunch at about noon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? What time do you go to work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And when do you get home at night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get home pretty late , around midnight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what do you do , exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a TV announcer . Don't you recognize me ? I do the weather report on KNT !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gee , I'm sorry . I don't watch TV .
segments.speaker: S1
